articles.author: AFP
articles.title: EU health watchdog approves fifth Covid vaccine - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: This will be the fifth Covid-19 vaccine approved for use in the European Union.
articles.content:
Updated 1 hour ago
EUROPES MEDICINES WATCHDOG has approved a Covid jab by US-based Novavax, which uses a more conventional technology that the biotech firm hopes will reduce vaccine hesitancy.

articles.author: RT
articles.title: EU regulator approves fifth Covid-19 vaccine - RT
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency (EMA) has recommended the use of a Covid-19 vaccine made by US-based biotech firm Novavax for people aged 18 and older. Trial data suggests the vaccine is 90% effective.
articles.content:
On Monday, the EMA backed the use of Nuvaxovid, a vaccine developed by Novavax, for adults, making it the fifth Covid shot to date to be given the green light by the bloc’s drugs regulator.  
“After… [+1815 chars]

articles.title: Omicron fears send Bursa, regional markets lower - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: The FBM KLCI extended its decline headed into midday as fears over the spread of the Omicron variant of Covid-19 intensified restriction measures in Europe and triggered global selling in equities.
